mapper.select: SELECT /* loginProc : 로그인 처리 */ MNGR_ID AS MNGRID , MNGR_NM AS MNGRNM , PKG_OBFUS.DECRYPT(PASSWORD,'NAEODOCZ') AS MNGRPW , MNGR_EMAIL AS MNGREMAIL , MNGR_DEPT AS MNGRDEPT , AUTHOR_CODE AS AUTHORCODE , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS FRSTREGISTPNTTM , MNGR_SE_CODE FROM MANAG_USER WHERE MNGR_ID = #userId# AND PASSWORD = PKG_OBFUS.ENCRYPT(#password#,'NAEODOCZ')
